The Parable Sutra says,
The Buddha and Ananda were walking by the river.

Ananda asked the Buddha,

The Buddha answered Ananda,
The sons and relatives of hungry ghosts can perform meritorious deeds for them and achieve liberation.

The sons and relatives of good families only engage in killing.

How can we kill each other?

They then killed the guide and used him to make a sacrifice.

They died of exhaustion and despair.
